entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Space character in Webview's Source causes net::ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND error #23767
  • Picker text colour not changing with theme #23760
    Backlog
  • Grid Background spill outside of the background #23755
  • Unable to Disable the Window preview in MAUI #23754
  • .NET 8.0 iOS app crashes on lauch since updating to iOS 18.3 beta #23753
  • CarouselView items are not updated correctly. #23749
    Backlog
  • When using DragGestureRecognizer, the drag target does not have Scale applied. #23748
    Backlog

Closed

  • Orientation Layout Background not working on iOS with LinearGradientBrush #23763
  • Remove IHybridWebView properties #23687
    9.0-preview7
  • Will there be something new to replace XAML? #23756

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: HybridWebView: Invoke JS methods from .NET #23769
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Increase iOS Device Test Time out to 90 #23768
  • [android] update AOT profile for servicing #23765
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [core] Fix tests when converting with PT Locale #23764
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Accessibility] Add accessibility label to the menu button #23762
    t/a11y
  • [iOS] CollectionView - Use compositional layouts #23758
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #23752
  • Android ecosystem updates 20240718 based on net9.0 branch #23751
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.5.4 to 1.5.5 #23750
    community ✨

Merged

  • Move the legacy layouts into the right folder #23766
  • [ci] Update pool #23759
    area-infrastructure
  • [ci] Use drop service for SDK insertion artifacts #23658
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Obsolete compatibility layout #23710
    area-layout
  • [net8.0] Update net8.0 to Sonoma and iOS #23655
    area-infrastructure
  • Bring back ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource #23683
    area-xaml, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • HandlerBehavior DisconnectionPolicy #23738
  • Don't let Glide clear the old image on Android ImageView unless we get an error #23313
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-image
  • [android] improve performance of `ImageHandler.PlatformArrange()` #23665
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-image, t/perf
  • Account for safearea #23729
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Android ecosystem updates 20240618 based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Handle non-seekable streams in `PlatformImage.FromStream` #23626
    community ✨
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • [net9.0] Delete obsolete Mappers #23712
  • Stop using `IPlatformSizeService` #23725
  • [Binding SG] Dogfood binding source generator in the MAUI codebase #23393
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Add warning when trying to access private members #23671
  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [ci] Add scheduled push to nightly feed job #23721
    area-infrastructure
  • Do not solely make Visual Diagnostics available on debugger being attached #23490
  • Fire UpdateValue after all propertychange events #23746
  • Obsolete setting mainpage via application #23692
